entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-18
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [NETE2ESDK] [Regression] Debug test failed on vscode with 9.0.100-preview.2.24128.5(runtime-9.0.0-preview.2.24127.9) installed. #39114

Updated

  • GivenThatWeHaveAPackageReferenceWithAliases tests failing in CI #39068
  • Re-enable EndToEnd_NoAPI_Web test #33858
  • Ensure NuGet.Localization is updated as part of the NuGet code flow #39559
  • Wrong "workload not found" message #31835
    8.0.2xx
  • Cannot update workload manifests from authenticated AzDO feeds on macOS #35912
  • dotnet tool restore interactive doesn't prompt for DeviceFlow since .NET 6 SDK #22987
    8.0.2xx
  • Retrieving assembly version or other related info without reflection #39555
  • MSBuild: Custom Target after Publish runs before AoT binary is in publish directory #39549

PullRequests

Created

  • Add nuget.localization to dependency flow #39602
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add nuget.localization to depencency flow #39595
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add nuget.localization to codeflow #39594
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add nuget.localization to codeflow #39593
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add nuget.localization to codeflow #39591
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enabling codeflow of nuget.localization #39590
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add nuget localization to the dependency flow #39589
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add nuget localization to the dependency flow #39588
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add nuget localization to the dependency flow #39584
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use System.Text.Json in Netfx build of MSBuildSdkResolver #39573
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

Merged

  • Branding for Preview 4 🦠 #39601
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Workload history 3 #36809
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Move dotnet/format to dotnet/sdk #38857
    untriaged
  • No drive enumerations Fixes #38050 #38436
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Create a new label with TFM of the app and the SDK used to build the image #39196
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Add `--arch` and `--os` options to commands that already support `--runtime` option #37429
    untriaged, Area-CLI
